forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
